title.rendered: The 5 Steps to Create Winning Marketing Attribution

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1508963945093{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 130px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background: #666468 url(http://sharpspring.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/single-resource-page-1902×496.png?id=158417) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The 5 Steps to Create Winning Marketing Attribution

Ensure your marketing efforts are actually converting to sales

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
4 Big Reasons Your Agency Must Implement Marketing Automation
[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]We’ve all heard the saying: “I know half my marketing dollars are wasted, I just don’t know which half.” John Wannaker first said it, more than 100 years ago!

Even today, small and medium-sized businesses continue to struggle when trying to determine which of their marketing initiatives are working and which aren’t. But you don’t have to stay stuck investing in campaigns with no way to measure their impact.

In this fast-paced, fact-filled webinar featuring digital marketing guru Jay Baer, you’ll get an inside peek at new research findings and a break-down of the 5 key steps to solving the marketing attribution riddle. The best part? You’ll get all this in just 15 minutes![/vc_column_text]

Your Host

Jay Baer

Founder, Convince & Convert (And 4 Other Agencies)

New York Times best-selling author, keynote speaker, and co-host of the SocialPros podcast. Join him for a relevant, timely session that will have you pumping your fist, and ready to get rolling with marketing automation immediately.

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274338786{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
